2080490.name: Leaving the formation
2080490.description:
Close the cockpit of your fighter, start the engine and take off. In the story mission, you will have to reliably cover your comrade in the course of a combat mission.
Realism like never before!
A fighter is a complex machine, with its own systems and features, which you have to master in order to successfully complete the task.
No more speed and distance limits. There are boundless expanses of outer space around. Feel what the cosmic scale really is.
Flying in space is a real test for a pilot. Huge overloads will push in all directions. You will have to maneuver correctly to gain an advantage over the enemy and win, and not lose sight and be destroyed.
A fully clickable cockpit allows you to better immerse yourself in the process of controlling a fighter.
The Newtonian physics of flight is reproduced with maximum accuracy, which allows for orbital flights and maneuvering.
2080490.supported_languages:
英语, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
